name: `Awesome Slushie Icy Dessert Drink Maker
description:
Have a huge craving for some slushie goodness? This is the perfect game for you! Over dozens of features of mixing and creating your own perfect slush!

[Features]
-Mix and blend your own slushie!
-Over dozens of creations, straws, cups, flavors to choose from!
-Save your own unique slush and share it with your friends!
-Decorate your slush with stickers and other goodies to choose from!
